mapper.insert:
insert into auth_user(username, password, role, enabled, real_name, phone, create_user_id, create_user_name, create_time, update_user_id, update_user_name, update_time, password_stamp) values
(#{item.username}, #{item.password}, #{item.role}, #{item.enabled}, #{item.realName}, #{item.phone}, #{item.createUserId}, #{item.createUserName}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateUserId}, #{item.updateUserName}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.passwordStamp})
